channel.title: Need Hoster!
channel.description: Ok guys i need a hoster if you want to host the server for me ill make you an admin ok so just post your email here saying that you want to host! Also post how long do you think you can keep it up for like 20/7 or like 24/7 or something like that.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 07:21:33 PM[/size][hr]Bump!

item.title: Need Hoster!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Dude , not many people will do this. So I am sorry i dont really keep my server up anymore everyone and a while i get bored… and just go on it. But most of the time i am reading tut’s and what not or helping people out. So i dont even keep mine up but maybe you can catch a break… and get someone to host it for you.

~bryanc~

Read full topic
